ygData.msgSnippet: Is it possible to somehow register additional KRYO bindings for CrawlURI serialisation? We want to store java.util.Date objects in the persistent data-map of a

Is it possible to somehow register additional KRYO bindings for CrawlURI se=
rialisation? We want to store java.util.Date objects in the persistent data=
-map of a CrawlURI, and those are not desiarialized correctly with KRYO (be=
cause all fields in a java.util.Date are transient).
